Uses of Interface
shape.Shape

    • Uses of Shape in shape

      Classes in shape that implement Shape 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Circle
      Implements Shape interface as Circle shape.
      class  ComposedShape
      Fits small shapes inside container shapes.
      class  Polygon
      Implements shape objects helps to draw polygon.
      class  PolygonDyn
      Extends from Polygon holds data as array.
      class  PolygonVect
      Extends from Polygon and holds data as arraylist.
      class  Rectangle
      Implements Shape interface as Rectangle shape.
      class  Triangle
      Implements Shape interface as Triangle shape.

      static void Global.sortShapes(Shape[] array)
